text: Moacyr Siqueira de Queiroz (18 December 1902 - 14 August 1992), known as Russinho, was a Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national football team at the 1930 FIFA World Cup finals. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (4): :Vasco da Gama: 1924, 1929, 1934 :Botafogo: 1935 ===Individual=== * Campeonato Carioca topscorer (3): :1924 (14 goal), 1929 (23 goal), 1931 (17 goal) ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Russinho (footballer, born 1902)
